page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: LOTS OF PEOPLE GO TO CHURCH ONE OF THE CHURCHES IS ST MARY'S CHURCH.I'M IN THEIR CHOIR. ST MARY'S CHURCH IS SMALL COMPARED TO WIMBORNE MINSTER. THE CHURCH HAS A LOT OF SEATS. MR DEAN IS OUR CHOIR MASTER HE IS A NICE MAN. SOME GO TO CHURCH ON SUNDAYS SOME GO TO CHURCH ON WEDNESDAY. THE CHURCH SERVICE GOES ON FOR ABOUT AN HOUR THEN AFTERWARDS WE HAVE COFFEE IN THE NORTH AISLE.THE METHODIST CHAPEL IS VERY SMALL IT HAS TWO ORGANS ONE IS ELETRIC ,ON THE OTHER YOU HAVE TO PUMP AIR. AT THE BACK OF METHODIST CHAPEL THERE IS A PIECE OF LAND WHERE THEY GROW THINGS.THERE IS ONE OTHER IN OUR BLOCK AND THAT IS IN SHAPWICK.LIKE ST MARY'S IT ALSO BELONGS THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND AND IS NEAR THE RIVER STOUR.
